description: The government is looking to purchase office furniture equipment for persons within the region of National Capital Region (NCR).
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Workspaces - Category 3 - Storage Lockers

**Title:** Workspaces - Category 3 - Storage Lockers
**Reference Number:** PW-23-01020136
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** R000124284
**Publication Date:** January 5, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** January 16, 2023, 2:00 PM
**Contracting Entity:** Shared Services Canada
## Brief Description

This Notice of Public Procurement (NPP) is issued under Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C and covers a requirement from Product Category 3— Metal Filing and Storage Cabinets.

## Tender Description

Shared Services Canada has a requirement for the purchase, delivery of office furniture on or before January 31, 2023. This NPP covers a requirement to be solicited amongst the General Stream of Suppliers (SA holders). The bid solicitation is open to suppliers who are pre-qualified and have a valid Supply Arrangement (SA), as well as suppliers who are not SA holders.

## Security and Trade Agreements

* Canada is not required to delay the award of a contract pending the evaluation of an arrangement and issuance of a SA by the PWGSC Supply Arrangement Authority.
* The bid solicitation is subject to the following Trade Agreements:
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Columbia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Chili Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP)
